abstract: Wind farm being developed by Deepwater Wind off Rhode Island coast is first of its kind in United States; experts and executives have warned that offshore wind development will not be viable unless industry receives stable subsidies and mandates, and degree to which country as whole prioritizes renewable energy.
lead_paragraph: Supporters hope that the modest five-turbine project, the nation’s first commercial scale offshore wind farm, will propel larger efforts at clean energy.

headline.main: Offshore Wind Farm Raises Hopes of U.S. Clean Energy Backers
headline.print_headline: Wind Farm Raises Hopes of Clean Energy Backers

snippet: Supporters hope that the modest five-turbine project, the nation’s first commercial scale offshore wind farm, will propel larger efforts at clean energy.
